Control.Name: ActionBarIcon
Control.Tooltip: Dismiss Pets

Control.Name: ShowThreatMeterButton
Control.Tooltip: Shows your threat VS the next person in line or the tank.

Control.Name: ToTButton
Control.Tooltip: Show the Target of Target Information

Control.Name: ShowPetFrameButton
Control.Tooltip: Shows pet frame for Engineers and Espers. Not needed for any other classes.

Control.Name: HazardMeterButton
Control.Tooltip: Show the Hazard / Breath meter.

Control.Name: ShowClusterFrameButton
Control.Tooltip: Shows linked units to your target. Linked units are pulled when you engage the target. These are the packs of 3 or more mobs.

Control.Name: ShowResourcesButton
Control.Tooltip: Displays your Class Resource bar

Control.Name: ShowCarbineResourcesButton
Control.Tooltip: Show Original Carbine Resources

Control.Name: AutoHideResourceButton
Control.Tooltip: Hide resource bar when not in combat.

Control.Name: FocusPercentageButton
Control.Tooltip: Show Focus on the Resource Bar(Only if you are Medic/Esper/SS)

Control.Name: DisplayFocusButton
Control.Tooltip: Show Focus on the Resource Bar(Only if you are Medic/Esper/SS and over 95%)

Control.Name: UseGenericResources
Control.Tooltip: Use a basic resource bar with no frills. Some Class specific options will not be available.

Control.Tooltip: Click a Color to Bring up the ColorPicker

Control.Name: ColorForType
Control.Tooltip: Click a Color to Bring up the ColorPicker

Control.Name: EsperTAButton
Control.Tooltip: Displays a simulated MindBust Telegraph when at or above 4 Psi Points so you know where to aim! Requires "Smoother Casting" to be on

Control.Name: Sliderbox
Control.Tooltip: Adjusts the Opacity for the Telegraph Assist Outline

Control.Name: Window
Control.Tooltip: Adjusts the Opacity for the Telegraph Assist Outline

Control.Tooltip: While between 30 and 70 volatiity, change the resource bar to this color.

Control.Tooltip: This will change the PsiPoint count to include any stacks of Mental Overflow

Control.Name: EsperTrackChargesButton
Control.Tooltip: Display a marker for each Psi Charge you have. This can be a costly process to check.

Control.Name: Save2Button
Control.Tooltip: Save Settings to Slot 2.

Control.Text: Save slots are great if you like to swap layouts depending on your role. Also, it's a good idea to make a save in case your layout gets messed up. One click and you're back to where you want to be.

Control.Text: Paste into this input box and press Apply.
Control.Name: ImportSettingsWindow

Control.Text: Export and Import between characters. You can probably even share this code with your friends.

ShowClassIconsButton
Control.Tooltip: Show an icon representing the class or the Rank of the mob

Control.Name: AutoHideFrameButton
Control.Tooltip: Only show in combat or when HP is not 100%

Control.Name: ShowSpellTimeIcon
Control.Text: Show an extra Cast Time on left side of castbar
Control.Tooltip: Show Cast Time Remaining on the left side of the cast bar as well as the right.

Control.Name: ShowLevels
Control.Tooltip: Shows the level of the the object next to it's name

Control.Name: DisableEatAway
Control.Text: Disable Damage Display Effect on Bars
Control.Tooltip: Disable my "Eat Away" mechanic which shows chunks of the bar disappear as damage is dealt.

Control.Name: ShowMountInfo
Control.Tooltip: Add "on Hoverboard Mount" or similiar to the name

Control.Name: AutoHideNameButton
Control.Tooltip: Hides everything including your name. To leave a group you'll need to type /leave

Control.Name: ShowFrameBorders
Control.Tooltip: Show the borders around objects.

Control.Name: PercentagesButton
Control.Tooltip: Show Health as Percentages

Control.Name: ValueAndPercentageButton
Control.Tooltip: Show Health as Percentages

Control.Name: ShowFirstNames
Control.Tooltip: Shows only the first Names if they have a name longer than 10 characters or so.

Control.Name: RememberFocus
Control.Tooltip: Remembers the name of your focus target. If you wipe on a boss, it will refocus whatever has the same name as your last focus.

Control.Name: PercentDecimals
Control.Tooltip: Show a decmial point when showing percentages.

Form.Name: EditModeForm
Form.Tooltip: You can move this out of the way.

Control.Tooltip: Click this to move elements around

Control.Text: Frames now unlocked. You can move and resize most elements. Aim for the corners of the elements to resize easier.

Control.Text: Show Icons and IA on Cast Bar
Control.Tooltip: Show your Spell Icon or Targets CC Icon

Control.Name: SmoothCastBarButton
Control.Tooltip: Smoothly animate Cast Bars and allow LineDrawing

Control.Name: ProximityCastButton
Control.Text: Enable Proximity Castbars for nearby Foes
Control.Tooltip: Enable castbars for nearby foes even if you don't have them targeted. This works similiar to how Interruptor does it.

Control.Name: InterruptableCastButton
Control.Tooltip: Flash Castbar if the current spell is interruptable and the target has more than 1 Max IA.

Control.Tooltip: Range of detection while in a group.
